contact.title: Have questions? We’ve got answers!
contact.intro: Use the form below to contact us. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible, whether it’s for technical support, an administrative question, or any other request related to our services.

terms.title: Terms of Service (ToS)
terms.intro: These Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as 'ToS') govern access to and use of the website and the progressive web application (PWA) for background removal (hereinafter referred to as 'the Service'), operated by the Provider. By accessing or using the Service, the user acknowledges having read, understood, and accepted these terms without reservation.
terms.article1_text: The Service allows users to upload images to automatically remove their background using an image-processing algorithm. The Service is accessible via a progressive web application (PWA) and may include additional features available through paid subscription plans.
terms.article2_text: Access to the Service is open to any person of legal age or with the legal authorization of their guardian. Some features may require the creation of a user account and/or the purchase of a paid subscription. The user agrees to provide accurate information during registration and to keep it up to date.
terms.article3_text:
The user is solely responsible for the content (images, text, metadata) they upload, transfer, or process via the Service. The user is strictly prohibited from uploading any content that:
- is pedopornographic, violent, hateful, defamatory, obscene, or otherwise offensive,
- infringes any image rights, copyrights, or intellectual property rights,
- violates the laws and regulations in force in Switzerland, the European Union, or the user’s country.

The Provider reserves the right to suspend or delete, without prior notice, any account or content suspected of violating these terms or applicable laws, and to report any illegal activity to the competent authorities. The Provider declines any liability for content processed by users.
terms.article4_title: 4. Use of the Service and Limitations
terms.article4_text: The user agrees to use the Service only for lawful and personal purposes. The Service may not be used for fraud, spamming, AI model training without written authorization, or any unauthorized commercial exploitation. The Provider may limit or suspend access to the Service for maintenance, security, or in cases of detected abuse.
terms.article5_text: Certain Service features are available through paid subscriptions. Prices, durations, and conditions are clearly displayed before any purchase. Payments are processed securely through a third-party provider. Refunds are only issued in case of an error attributable to the Provider or in accordance with applicable consumer protection laws.
terms.article6_text: The data collected (account information, billing data, uploaded images) are processed in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection Act (FADP). Uploaded images are temporarily stored for processing and automatically deleted after a reasonable period. The user retains full ownership of their files.
terms.article7_text: The Service, its interface, algorithms, and trademarks are the exclusive property of the Provider. Any unauthorized reproduction, modification, or exploitation is strictly prohibited. The user retains intellectual property rights over the images they upload.
terms.article8_text: The Provider makes every effort to ensure the reliability and availability of the Service but does not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation. The Provider shall not be held liable for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the Service, including data loss, except in cases of proven gross negligence.
terms.article9_text: The Provider reserves the right to suspend or terminate a user account in case of violation of these ToS, suspected illegal activity, or abuse of the Service. In case of termination, no partial refund of a subscription will be granted.
terms.article10_text: These Terms are governed by Swiss law. In the event of a dispute, and unless otherwise required by mandatory legal provisions, the competent courts of the Canton of Vaud shall have exclusive jurisdiction.
terms.article11_text: The Provider reserves the right to modify these ToS at any time. Any modification becomes effective upon publication on the website. It is the user’s responsibility to regularly review the latest version of the Terms in force.
terms.conclusion: By using the Service, the user acknowledges having read and accepted these Terms of Service without reservation.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how the Provider collects, uses, stores, and protects users’ personal data (hereinafter referred to as 'the User') when using the background removal progressive web application (PWA) and related services (hereinafter referred to as 'the Service').
privacy.article1_text: The data controller responsible for processing personal data is the operator of the Service (hereinafter referred to as 'the Provider'). The Provider ensures that all processing activities comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR – EU 2016/679) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection Act (FADP).
privacy.article2_text:
The Provider collects only the data strictly necessary for the operation and improvement of the Service:

- Contact data : first name, last name, email address, message (via the contact form)
-  Payment data : first name, last name, postal address, email address (collected via Stripe). No sensitive data, such as full credit card numbers, is stored by the Provider.
- Technical data : IP address, browser type, operating system, access time (for statistical and security purposes)
- Uploaded images : images uploaded by the User are temporarily stored for processing. Some images may be retained in an anonymized and secure form to improve the algorithms and artificial intelligence models used by the Service.
privacy.article3_text:
The collected data are used exclusively for the following purposes:

- To provide and operate the Service properly
- To manage customer relationships and respond to contact requests
- To process payments and billing through Stripe
- To improve Service and AI performance (machine learning on anonymized images)
- To ensure system security and legal compliance
privacy.article4_text: The Service uses only one cookie, which is strictly necessary for its operation. It is used exclusively to maintain the User's secure authentication session. No advertising, tracking, or analytics cookies are used. This cookie is temporary and does not contain any direct personal data.
privacy.article5_text:
Data processing is based on the following legal grounds:
- Performance of a contract (subscription or Service use)
- Explicit consent of the User for processing uploaded images
- Legitimate interest of the Provider to improve the Service and ensure system security
privacy.article6_text:
Personal data are retained only for the time necessary to fulfill the purposes for which they were collected:
- Contact data: 12 months after the last interaction
- Payment data: retained for the statutory accounting period (10 years in Switzerland)
- Uploaded images: automatically deleted after processing, unless the User consents to their use for AI improvement (in which case, they are anonymized and non-traceable)
privacy.article7_text: The Provider implements all appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect data against loss, theft, unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration. All data exchanges are encrypted (HTTPS), and sensitive information is secured using international security standards.
privacy.article8_text:
Data are never sold to third parties. They may be shared only with:
- The payment processor **Stripe**, for transaction handling
- Technical service providers responsible for hosting and maintaining the Service, under strict confidentiality obligations

No data transfer outside Switzerland or the European Economic Area takes place without adequate protection guarantees.
privacy.article9_text:
In accordance with the GDPR and the FADP, the User has the following rights:
- Right of access to their data
- Right to rectification and erasure
- Right to object to or restrict processing
- Right to data portability
- Right to withdraw consent at any time

Requests to exercise these rights can be made via the contact form or by email to the Provider.
privacy.article10_text: The Provider reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time, particularly to comply with legal or technical developments. Any change becomes effective upon publication on the website. Users are encouraged to review the latest version regularly.
privacy.article11_text: For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy or the exercise of your rights, please contact the Provider through the website’s contact form.
privacy.conclusion: By using the Service, the User acknowledges having read and accepted this Privacy Policy.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.intro: This legal notice aims to define the information related to the publisher, the hosting provider, and the general terms of use of the website and the progressive web application (PWA) for background removal (hereinafter referred to as 'the Service').
legal.article1_text:
The website and the Service are published by:

Company name: Helveclick
Registered office address: Helveclick Dupanloup Guillaume, Chemin du Mont Paisible 1, 3963 Crans-Montana, Switzerland
Company identification or SIRET number:
Contact email address: info@helveclick.ch
Publication manager: Dupanloup Guillaume

The publisher is responsible for the content published on the website and for managing the Service.
legal.article2_text:
The website is hosted by:

Hosting provider: PlanetHoster
Address:
Website:
Contact email:

The hosting provider ensures the technical availability of the Service in accordance with its general terms and conditions.
legal.article3_text:
All content on the website and within the Service, including but not limited to text, images, graphics, logos, icons, sounds, videos, source code, and algorithms, is the exclusive property of the Provider, unless otherwise stated.

Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, transmission, or adaptation of all or part of the website content, by any means or process, is prohibited without the prior written authorization of the Provider.

Any unauthorized use constitutes an infringement of intellectual property rights and may result in legal action under Swiss and European law.
legal.article4_text:
The Provider strives to ensure the accuracy and regular updating of the information published on the website. However, the Provider cannot be held liable for any errors, omissions, interruptions, or temporary unavailability of the Service.

The User acknowledges that they use the Service at their own risk. The Provider shall not be held liable for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the Service, including data loss or file corruption.

The User is solely responsible for the content they upload via the Service. Any illegal content (including but not limited to content of a pedopornographic, violent, hateful nature, or contrary to Swiss and European law) is strictly prohibited and may be reported to the competent authorities.
legal.article5_text: The processing of personal data is governed by the Privacy Policy, which can be consulted at any time on the website. It details the nature of the data collected, the purposes of processing, retention periods, and the User’s rights in accordance with the GDPR and the Swiss Data Protection Act (FADP).
legal.article6_text: The website may contain hyperlinks to other websites. The Provider cannot be held responsible for the content, security, or privacy practices of such third-party sites. Access to these sites is at the sole responsibility of the User.
legal.article7_text: The Provider implements all necessary technical measures to secure access to and use of the Service. However, the User is informed that absolute security on the Internet does not exist. It is the User’s responsibility to protect their equipment and data (passwords, files, software).
legal.article8_text: This legal notice is governed by Swiss law. In the event of a dispute, and unless otherwise required by mandatory legal provisions, the competent courts of the Canton of Valais shall have exclusive jurisdiction.
legal.article9_text: For any questions regarding the website, its content, or its terms of use, you can contact the publisher via the website contact form or by email at info@helveclick.ch.
legal.conclusion: By accessing the website and using the Service, the User acknowledges having read and accepted this legal notice without reservation.
